I am a 5th year Ph.D. student at , IIIT-Delhi . I work in the domain of Computer Vision and Deep Learning. I am advised by Dr. Saket Anand . My Ph.D. is supported by Visvesvarya Ph.D. Fellowship, Govt. of India .


My Ph.D. research work focuses on robust statistical methods for learning and vision.

Research Interests:
  • Robust Geometric Computer Vision (2D and 3D)
  • Deep Learning For Geometric Computer Vision
  • Robust Statistical Methods For Robust Deep Learning
  • Image Based 3D Modeling
  • Computer Vision for Autonomous Driving

Awards/Honor/Grants/Fellowships

  • IEEE WACV 2018 Ph.D. Forum Travel Award
  • 2nd Prize, Poster Session, Research Showcase 2017 @ IIIT-Delhi.
  • Best Doctoral Symposium Award (3rd), ICVGIP'2016
  • IEEE Signal Processing Society, Travel Award to attend IEEE ICIP 2016
  • Visvesvarya Ph.D. Fellowship, Jul 2014- Dec 2019.
  • Graduate Fellowship, GATE (Top 4% in India), Jul 2012- Jun 2014.
  • University Topper and Chancellor's Gold Medal in B.Tech CSE.
  • Academic Merit Award for the year 2003, 2004, 2005.
  • Best student of the year 2003.
